#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	ll t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		ll count=0;
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			while(n%2==0)
			{
				count++;
				n/=2;
			}
		}
		if(n>1)
		{
			for(ll i=3;i*i<=n;i+=2)
			{
				
				while(n%i==0)
				{
					count++;
					n/=i;
				}
				
			}
			if(n>1)
			{
				count+=1;
			}
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
}
